message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. This is a great deal for a product worth much more to me. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,500. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm willing to come down to $9,750.  This is a fair price, and it allows us both to get a good deal. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am willing to consider $9,600 as a fair price for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
